##Basic statistics

```{r}
lipidomics %>%
  group_by(metabolite) %>%
  summarise(across( # given these columns, do this action
    value,
    list( # give it a list, if you want it to have a name
      mean = mean,
      sd = sd
    )
  )) %>%
  mutate(across(
    where(is.numeric),
    ~ round(.x, digits = 1) # to do it for all columns at once
  ))
```
